snippet: Before an adult child returns, the family needs to have a conversation laying out everyone’s expectations and agreeing on the rules.
abstract: It is important for parents to establish specific expectations and rules when children return to their parent's home following college, such as chores, employment, and most importantly, a deadline for their departure.
lead_paragraph: Before an adult child returns, the family needs to have a conversation laying out everyone’s expectations and agreeing on the rules.

headline.seo: Rules for When Your Child Moves Home
headline.main: Rules for When the Chicks Return to the Nest
headline.print_headline: Rules for When the Chicks Return to the Nest
